line.originaltext: 6 tablespoons butter or margarine, divided
line.annotation: create_ing(ing0, "6 tablespoons butter or margarine, divided")

line.originaltext: 1 1/2 pounds halibut steaks, bones removed and cut into 1 inch cubes
line.annotation: create_ing(ing1, "1 1/2 pounds halibut steaks, bones removed and cut into 1 inch cubes")

line.originaltext: 2 garlic cloves, minced
line.annotation: create_ing(ing2, "2 garlic cloves, minced")

line.originaltext: 3/4 teaspoon dried thyme
line.annotation: create_ing(ing3, "3/4 teaspoon dried thyme")

line.originaltext: 1/3 cup all-purpose flour
line.annotation: create_ing(ing4, "1/3 cup all-purpose flour")

line.originaltext: 1/2 teaspoon salt
line.annotation: create_ing(ing5, "1/2 teaspoon salt")

line.originaltext: 1 1/2 cups chicken broth
line.annotation: create_ing(ing6, "1 1/2 cups chicken broth")

line.originaltext: 1 cup heavy whipping cream
line.annotation: create_ing(ing7, "1 cup heavy whipping cream")

line.originaltext: 8 ounces lasagna noodles, cooked and drained
line.annotation: create_ing(ing8, "8 ounces lasagna noodles, cooked and drained")

line.originaltext: 2 cups shredded Swiss cheese
line.annotation: create_ing(ing9, "2 cups shredded Swiss cheese")

line.originaltext: Minced fresh parsley
line.annotation: create_ing(ing10, "Minced fresh parsley")

line.originaltext: In a large skillet over medium heat, melt 2 tablespoons butter.
line.annotation: create_tool(t0, "large skillet")

line.originaltext: In a large skillet over medium heat, melt 2 tablespoons butter.
line.annotation: separate(ing0, ing11, "4 tablespoons butter", ing12, "2 tablespoons butter", "")

line.originaltext: In a large skillet over medium heat, melt 2 tablespoons butter.
line.annotation: cook(ing12, t0, ing13, "melted butter", "medium heat, melt butter")

line.originaltext: Add halibut, garlic and thyme.
line.annotation: combine({ing1, ing13, ing2, ing3}, ing14, "butter, halibut, garlic, thyme", "")

line.originaltext: Cook until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 10 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing14, t0, ing15, "cooked halibut", "cook 10 minutes, until fish flakes easily with a fork")

line.originaltext: Remove and set aside.
line.annotation: remove(ing15,t0)

line.originaltext: Remove and set aside.
line.annotation: leave(ing15,"")

line.originaltext: Add the remaining butter to the skillet.
line.annotation: put(ing11, t0)

line.originaltext: Stir in flour and salt until smooth; cook and stir until golden brown.
line.annotation: combine({ing11, ing4, ing5}, ing16, "butter, flour, salt", "")

line.originaltext: Stir in flour and salt until smooth; cook and stir until golden brown.
line.annotation: mix(ing16, t0, ing17, "butter, flour, salt", "stir until smooth")

line.originaltext: Stir in flour and salt until smooth; cook and stir until golden brown.
line.annotation: cook(ing17, t0, ing18, "cooked butter, flour, salt", "cook and stir until golden brown")

line.originaltext: Gradually add broth and cream.
line.annotation: combine({ing18, ing6, ing7}, ing19, "butter, flour, salt, broth, cream", "gradually add broth and cream")

line.originaltext: Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
line.annotation: cook(ing19, t0, ing20, "cooked lasagna filling", "bring to a boil, cook and stir for 2 minutes until thickened")

line.originaltext: In a greased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking dish, layer half of the noodles, halibut, white sauce and cheese.
line.annotation: create_tool(t1, "13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking dish")

line.originaltext: In a greased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking dish, layer half of the noodles, halibut, white sauce and cheese.
line.annotation: set(t1,"grease")

line.originaltext: In a greased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking dish, layer half of the noodles, halibut, white sauce and cheese.
line.annotation: separate(ing8, ing21, "4 ounces of lasagna noodles", ing22, "4 ounces of lasagna noodles", "")

line.originaltext: In a greased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking dish, layer half of the noodles, halibut, white sauce and cheese.
line.annotation: separate(ing9, ing23, "1 cup cheese", ing24, "1 cup cheese", "")

line.originaltext: In a greased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking dish, layer half of the noodles, halibut, white sauce and cheese.
line.annotation: separate(ing15, ing25, "half of halibut", ing26, "half of halibut", "")

line.originaltext: In a greased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking dish, layer half of the noodles, halibut, white sauce and cheese.
line.annotation: separate(ing20, ing27, "half of white sauce", ing28, "half of white sauce", "")

line.originaltext: In a greased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking dish, layer half of the noodles, halibut, white sauce and cheese.
line.annotation: combine({ing21, ing23, ing25, ing27}, ing29, "first layer", "layer ingredients")

line.originaltext: Repeat layers.
line.annotation: combine({ing22, ing24, ing26, ing28, ing29}, ing30, "uncooked lasagna", "layer ingredients on top of first layer")

line.originaltext: Cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 20 minutes.
line.annotation: create_tool(t2, "oven")

line.originaltext: Cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 20 minutes.
line.annotation: set(t2,"350 degrees")

line.originaltext: Cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 20 minutes.
line.annotation: put(ing30, t1)

line.originaltext: Cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 20 minutes.
line.annotation: set(t1,"cover pot")

line.originaltext: Cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 20 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing30, t1, ing31, "half cooked lasagna", "bake for 20 minutes")

line.originaltext: Uncover; bake 20 minutes longer or until bubbly.
line.annotation: set(t1,"uncover pot")

line.originaltext: Uncover; bake 20 minutes longer or until bubbly.
line.annotation: cook(ing31, t1, ing32, "cooked lasagna", "bake 20 minutes or until bubbly")

line.originaltext: Let stand 15 minutes before serving.
line.annotation: leave(ing32,"let stand 15 minutes")

line.originaltext: Sprinkle with parsley if desired.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing32}, ing33, "finished lasagna", "sprinkle with parsley")

line.originaltext: Sprinkle with parsley if desired.
line.annotation: serve(ing33,"")
